prompt:
Schema:
Roles(RoleID, RoleName)
Users(UserID, RoleID, FirstName, LastName, Email, PasswordHash, DateOfBirth, CreatedAt)
Categories(CategoryID, CategoryName)
Products(ProductID, CategoryID, ProductName, Price, StockQuantity)
Orders(OrderID, UserID, OrderDate, TotalAmount)
OrderItems(OrderItemID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, Price)
Addresses(AddressID, UserID, Street, City, State, PostalCode, IsPrimary)
Payments(PaymentID, OrderID, PaymentDate, PaymentMethod, Amount)
Reviews(ReviewID, ProductID, UserID, Rating, Comment, ReviewDate)
Coupons(CouponID, Code, DiscountPercentage, ExpiryDate)
Wishlist(WishlistID, UserID, ProductID)
Cart(CartID, UserID)
CartItems(CartItemID, CartID, ProductID, Quantity)
Shipment(ShipmentID, OrderID, ShippedDate, EstimatedDeliveryDate, Status)
Suppliers(SupplierID, SupplierName, ContactEmail)

Request: List all users with their roles.

Schema:
Roles(RoleID, RoleName)
Users(UserID, RoleID, FirstName, LastName, Email, PasswordHash, DateOfBirth, CreatedAt)
Categories(CategoryID, CategoryName)
Products(ProductID, CategoryID, ProductName, Price, StockQuantity)
Orders(OrderID, UserID, OrderDate, TotalAmount)
OrderItems(OrderItemID, OrderID, ProductID, Quantity, Price)
Addresses(AddressID, UserID, Street, City, State, PostalCode, IsPrimary)
Payments(PaymentID, OrderID, PaymentDate, PaymentMethod, Amount)
Reviews(ReviewID, ProductID, UserID, Rating, Comment, ReviewDate)
Coupons(CouponID, Code, DiscountPercentage, ExpiryDate)
Wishlist(WishlistID, UserID, ProductID)
Cart(CartID, UserID)
CartItems(CartItemID, CartID, ProductID, Quantity)
Shipment(ShipmentID, OrderID, ShippedDate, EstimatedDeliveryDate, Status)
Suppliers(SupplierID, SupplierName, ContactEmail)

Request: What is the most common payment method used by user 'a' across all orders made by them
completion: SELECT p.paymentMethod from Users u inner join orders o on u.id = o.userid join payments p on p.orderid = o.id where u.FirstName = 'a' group by p.paymentMethod order by count(1) desc

Request: What is the most common payment method used by user 'a' made by them
completion: SELECT p.paymentMethod from Users u inner join orders o on u.id = o.userid join payments p on p.orderid = o.id where u.FirstName = 'a' group by p.paymentMethod order by count(1) desc
